meanings.sent1: The northeasternmost corner of the room was dimly lit.
meanings.sent2: The house is located at the northeasternmost point of the street.
meanings.sent3: The cat always chooses the northeasternmost spot to nap in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile reached the northeasternmost corners of the room.
meanings.sent5: The northeasternmost star in the sky twinkled brightly.

meanings.definition: Located in the most northeastern direction
meanings.sent1: We hiked to the northeasternmost peak for a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent2: The northeasternmost building on campus is the library.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored its nuts in the northeasternmost tree for safekeeping.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed from the northeasternmost part of the valley.
meanings.sent5: The northeasternmost boundary of the forest was marked by a stream.
